DisplayForm.Script: <UiScreen> <LinkScreen> <Description>linkctrl01.xml</Description> <EitherOrControl> <ItemY href="./_choiceA.xml"> <Label imgsrc="./choice.jpg">GOTO choicA</Label> </ItemY> <ItemN href="./_choiceB.xml"> <Label imgsrc="./choice.jpg">GOTO choicB</Label> </ItemN> </EitherOrControl> </LinkScreen> </UiScreen>
